line_work.description: very smooth and clean lines. NO sketchiness, NO rough textures, NO broken lines.

coloring.technique: smooth digital coloring with soft airbrush gradients
coloring.shading: clean soft shading to show volume. Minimal texture.
coloring.palette: Praxis Feinblick palette: warm beige, soft sage, muted coral, calming blues

hair.style: neat low ponytail, wispy side-swept bangs

eyes.eyewear: large round thin silver metal frames
